Curator's comments: On the use of dom palm fruit in pharaonic Egypt, see M.A. Murray, 'Fruits, Vegtables, Pulses and Condiments' in P.T. Nicholson and I. Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge, 2000), 620-1.
Bibliographic references: Cartwright and Taylor 2015 / Ancient Egyptian funerary food: new insights (p.99, table.1, p.100, p.103, p.105)
